socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Qualitative impacts on daily activities and productivity
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: The patient journey to diagnosis and treatment of congenital sucrase-isomaltase deficiency

justification: Only qualitative descriptions of burden from patient journey reports citeturn0search3 and program information on financial concerns and assistance citeturn0search0turn0search1 were identified, with no peer-reviewed cost-of-illness studies specific to CSID.
